website_summaries.verdict: Fun strategy game that's also simple enough to allow youngsters to start playing quickly.
pros: Mystery solving game offers multiple fun characters and strategic options that encourage repeated game play
All pieces required to begin playing are included
One of the most popular board games of all time, which appeals to people of all ages
Offered at a good price point
cons: Some nuances of the game will be too much for younger kids to handle

customer_reviews.title: Item not as described!
customer_reviews.text: I loved Clue growing up and decided to get a new one to introduce my children. The manufacturer description states Clue game includes 2 versions, the Mansion game and the Boardwalk game Features updated rooms, weapons, guests 2-sided gameboard Ages 8 and up For 3 to 6 players However, when it arrived these claims are inaccurate as the game board is just a standard one sided game. I wanted to prepare others prior to ordering so no one else gets the same disappointment when opening to see the new version that doesn’t exist in this set.
customer_reviews.author: Dryabeth

customer_reviews.title: False advertising of the game listed.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the new version of Clue under the pretense of what was listed about the game. More specifically the double sided game board with the boardwalk as the new way to play. I was highly disappointed this morning when I received my game to find out it is just the standard game board. No doubt i won't order this again as the contents listed are completely false of what is actually in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron G.

customer_reviews.title: Fun, entertaining game
customer_reviews.text: Hubby and I received a copy of this game 34 years ago as a wedding present, and what a great present it was. We had little money for extras like entertainment such as movies, going out to dinner, etc. So, this game came in super handy many nights. Unfortunately, that game was ruined in a flooding incident in our basement not long ago. I saw this advertised on Amazon, and it was such a great price I had to buy it! Arrived promptly and in great condition. A new character has been introduced - Dr. Orchid!
customer_reviews.author: L. Terri Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Still a mystery
customer_reviews.text: The board is one of those quad fold things and is on the cheaper side. They have added a new character and it has an option to play with two players now which has always been an issue. The game is still pretty much the same. I don't remember there being cards wherein "the person to your left has to show you a card." We don't use those often because with three players, the game is over so quickly. You don't need to pay for thr original or retro versions, this one words just fine and the box is easier to store.
customer_reviews.author: valentineslover

customer_reviews.title: Just like when you were a young detective!
customer_reviews.text: The Good: -Tons of fun -If you’re older brings back a lot of memories, new players will enjoy learning also -Great fit those who like reasoning and thinking things out The Bad: -None The Bottom Line: I used to love playing Clue when I was younger so getting this now for my younger nephew brought back a lot of memories. This set is just like older editions of the game. Basically if you like detective work or thinking things out, this is a great game. Overall I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hoppaguy

customer_reviews.title: Get a "Clue" and get this.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's favorite game. So much so that she wore out our classic version and we ended up having to get this. It was on sale for under $9, so why not? I like the changes. Two dice instead of the classic single die leads to quicker game play. The "Clue" cards help speed things along as well. I do wish they'd have added Dr. Orchid instead of just eliminating Mrs. White, and I wish they'd add "Agent Orange" to the game as well.
customer_reviews.author: Megan J.

customer_reviews.title: As Good as Ever
customer_reviews.text: The new character doesn't bother me. As long as we till have Colonel Musytard and Miss Scarlett, I'm happy.. The challenge is the same logic problem it has always been. Had a great time with a 12 year old grandson, a 36 year old son and me ...everyone enjoyed it. Of course we also tried to throw each other off with misleading remarks and by making skeptical faces . It never gets old!
customer_reviews.author: A. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: No boardwalk :(
customer_reviews.text: I bought this version due being able to play both the mansion and boardwalk boards per the description. My box only had the mansion and no boardwalk. Very disappointed. I didn’t give an even lower rating since I am still able to play the game with my children.
customer_reviews.author: Aloradela

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: We play this game with 3 players and it doesn't get boring.Just the basic game but it is low priced compared to others so we are happy with it. THERE IS NO TWO SIDED BOARD.Not sure why that is in the description but this is the standard one side playing board.For the price its a great deal and a fun game.
customer_reviews.author: CarKar.

customer_reviews.title: NOT doubled sided
customer_reviews.text: This is not a double sided game board - just the standard mansion (NO boardwalk on the reverse side). But for under $9 it’s still worth it for the price for a board game, I just don’t appreciate the false advertising. I do believe it has some differences from the original game I remember - there are optional clue cards (used when you roll a 1) that make 1 or multiple players reveal cards to others (which I guess moves the game along faster which could be good with inpatient kids) but you can also play without those cards.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A family classic!
customer_reviews.text: This was one of my favorite games growing up. Since we are all home bound because of Covid, I was trying to add a few new games to our collection to help freshen it up. We have a son that is 15 years old and a daughter that is 9 years old. This has easily become their second favorite game ever! Blokus is number one, and is also another Covid purchase. Clue is great for many different ages, and we easily play four rounds in one sitting. No regrets with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: morrest1101

customer_reviews.title: Fun and encourages critical-thinking
customer_reviews.text: You can play classic Clue, this version with new Clue cards, or when you want to play a quick game, you can play by house rules like us. We have played the Classic version and removed the Clue cards. We have played with those cards. And in a hurry, we give one Clue card to each player per turn and if they roll the magnifying glass, they get those, too. Makes the game go fast but is still fun and challenging. Love how this makes my 8-year-old think critically.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly I.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite game since I was a child
customer_reviews.text: When I was a kid, my two favorite games were Monopoly and Clue. I thought I still had the game but couldn't find it, so finally bought it here. I have now hooked my son and his dad on the game, and we play it almost every night. The only reason this isn't a 5 star review is due to the obvious PC notion that Miss White should be replaced with Miss Orchid. Don't mess with the classics!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Bak

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages.
customer_reviews.text: I love clue. Our family has had a blast with this game. Younger kids may need a little help keeping track, and if you have kids with ADHD they may struggle a bit paying attention, but it's probably a great brain exercise for this. We've played this game with all ages, from 9 to adult.
customer_reviews.author: DesertBlossom

customer_reviews.title: It accommodates quite a few people so it's good for parties because a lot of people can play
customer_reviews.text: We played this at a Halloween party and it was a hit. It accommodates quite a few people so it's good for parties because a lot of people can play. I wasn't missing any pieces or anything that was supposed to come with the game, everything arrived in perfect condition. This game is a classic and for $8 it's definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: bf

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Price was good, but the game I received did not have the 2 sided game board as described (original and boardwalk game board), it only had a single sided original board. No instructions for the boardwalk version were included either.
customer_reviews.author: RWH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Game Night!
customer_reviews.text: I love this game! It is probably my new favorite board game. This was my first time playing this game EVER so at first the instructions seemed a bit unclear, it took actually playing the game to understand the rules. I think the quality of the game is great, I cannot compare it to the classic version but I do like this version and it was a great first experience for me 🙌
customer_reviews.author: Syeda

customer_reviews.title: Same Game with a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a more compact version of the original version; all the game pieces are still there and it looks updated. The addition of the new clue cards made it a bit more exciting & go a little faster, which was perfect for my new to Clue 8 year old. This version was much cheaper than the other versions, but it really is the same game. Go this option unless you’re really nostalgic about the retro version.
customer_reviews.author: MommyToTwoGals

customer_reviews.title: You “dunnit”
customer_reviews.text: Clue has become dumbed down offering new changes to the gameplay to speed along the game as well as cards that give you help along clues as to whodunnit. Each game took like 5 minutes with my family before we each solved the murders. Dumb.
customer_reviews.author: Anthoy F. Stefani

customer_reviews.title: One Of My Favorite Games
customer_reviews.text: This really is a favorite game of mine, but as far as quality goes, the original is better. I understand people making stuff on the cheap to sell it cheaper, but I'd rather spend a few extra dollars and have great quality. The game itself is a lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Deloris P.

customer_reviews.title: Clue Game with New Character update
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this game for our daughter because we knew how much fun it was for us as kids. This is an updated version with a new character, and it's a great game, lots of fun, I highly recommend it. The board is much smaller in size so it can easily be played anywhere and vibrantly colored. Game contains all cards for rooms, characters and weapons, checklist pads, envelope for the crime data, weapons, dice and player pieces, everything you need to play.
customer_reviews.author: karma

customer_reviews.title: This game is not double sided.
customer_reviews.text: Description says "2 Sided gameboard". The Boardwalk version is supposed to be on the back. It is not.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Not the North American version.
customer_reviews.text: This is the version for distribution in Australia. We are having fun playing it. Looking online for rule clarification is a nightmare. So many versions with different rules. The "blocking a room" rule is vague...very vague. There are rules in the North American version that are really different from the Australian rules for staying in a room. This is a great game to have. It is in our game rotation for our nightly after supper game. We are all adults but this is a game from our childhood.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good classic board game
customer_reviews.text: Good old CLUE. grew up playing this game. They have politically corrected the player Mrs. White to Mrs. Orchid (asian) now in this newer version. but anywho... this has new Clue cards along with the player cards, so if you play that version interesting things happen and the game moves along a bit faster.
customer_reviews.author: Ria B.

customer_reviews.title: Very fun!
customer_reviews.text: This version of clue is super fun. There are special cards that you can use to make people reveal their cards and stuff. It makes the game go and lot faster. It also makes it more enjoyable to play with preteens! I didnt do a full five stars because i dont like how the characters pieces are just colored pawns now and not the actual person.
customer_reviews.author: Laura E.

customer_reviews.title: Family fun
customer_reviews.text: Just as fun as I remembered! I got this game for my boyfriend and I to play during quarantine. It was nice to switch things up, and I’m happy to report that it was still fun to play as an adult. It would have been better with more people, but a great family game for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Classic game for less than $10
customer_reviews.text: This is the classic game with some minor changes. The board is slightly smaller, the box is much smaller, and Mrs. White is now 'Dr. Orchid'. There is also a side deck of cards for a game variant if you choose to play that. I play this with my kids once a week or so, and we all love it. Dim the lights, play some suspenseful music, and get ready to solve a murder mystery in the Clue house! Hahaha
customer_reviews.author: Braeden H

customer_reviews.title: Fun game for the family!
customer_reviews.text: I read so many great reviews about this game so I decided to buy it before going on quarantine. It has been great for entertaining us. It took us a few tries to figure out many features of the game but as advertised it is really fun, unpredictable and has kept us hooked in the last two months. I highly recommend it. My boys are teens and they get a kick out of it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Zuluaga-Adkisson

customer_reviews.title: Fun and engaging for all.
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a game the while family can enjoy. I have been searching for a game that the adults will enjoy as much as the children and seem to fail every time (except for "watch yo mouth"). It great to hear my child request to play a bored game rather then some screen time. I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R

customer_reviews.title: Classic game with optional new gameplay
customer_reviews.text: This is just a slightly updated version of the original game. You can play the original way or with some new options. They replaced Mrs White with Dr Orchid and the cards/board has a modernized look. Additionally, they added rules for a 2-player game and some special gameplay cards used in conjunction with a second die. Definitely NOT worth paying amidst 3 times as much for the “classic” version. Some classics they really mess up with a modern version, but this they did right and left you the original game and some new OPTIONAL twists.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnna Schofield

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Legit clue game.
customer_reviews.text: Got this game on sale for like 8 dollars! Game came sealed and in perfect condition! Shipping was fast! Box doesnt quite look the Same as what im used too, but its the same old clue game! And thats all i wanted!! Poor Ol Mrs. White must've passed tho :( because they added a different character in her place.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Veryfun
customer_reviews.text: Can’t give five stars because they didn’t include the envelope to hide the cards of whodunnit. While it’s just the case file envelope and we can lay them face down it’s a part that says it should be included and isn’t. I enjoy the new clue cards that you can use with this new version.
customer_reviews.author: Sih3wolf

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I tried to take a picture but it wouldn’t work for me. The box arrived damaged. Has a huge dent all down the right side. Funny enough, the inspection sticker is butted up against the dent. Haven’t checked inside to see if everything is there but sure disappointed in quality control.
customer_reviews.author: mommyo

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a fun game and it is definitely an upgraded version from the original. The only reason I'm giving four stars is because the game came damaged and I had to return it and get another. But it was a great gift and my friend loved it. It was very nostaglic for her.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: This version of clue is very nice but it is a little to easy
customer_reviews.text: This version of clue is very nice but it is a little to easy! There aren't as many weapons and suspects like some other versions. The 7 and 8 year old I babysit quickly solved the mystery in a few rounds.
customer_reviews.author: Mike g

customer_reviews.title: A Family Favorite
customer_reviews.text: Our kids are 10 and 8 and LOVE this game!! They know what it takes to win but haven’t quite figured out strategy yet. A great game and a fam favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Caissey

customer_reviews.title: Super FUN!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this game on Amazon Prime Day for a really good deal. Just played it on date night and it was a hit. Super fun, even with 2 people. We both had never played before so it took a couple minutes for us to learn how to play, but once we did, we really enjoyed it. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SMN

customer_reviews.title: My kids love this
customer_reviews.text: I loved this game as a kid and now my kids have discovered it and they love it too. My 6 year old does struggle a bit with reading the card but otherwise enjoys the game. Have only played the "classic" way, but the game does come with a new twist to it which i haven't tried yet. Good family fun.
customer_reviews.author: cornbread

customer_reviews.title: Great family game!
customer_reviews.text: Our family LOVES this game. Our kids request it often for game night. It took a little time for our 7yr to understand the rules and strategy but after a few games he’s craftier than all of us!
customer_reviews.author: J. H.

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This game is really fun for a family game night! My daughter got this game for the family and we all really enjoy playing it. Get some popcorn and snacks and enjoy as a family. Great gift, I would recommend this game.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. De La Cruz

customer_reviews.title: fun game, good price
customer_reviews.text: This game is similar to the classic game from the 1970s/1980s, but has an extra character and room, to add a little extra to the game, otherwise it's played exactly the same way. It was a really good price, and it arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kalish

customer_reviews.title: Very fun for me and my 10 year old!
customer_reviews.text: Soooooo much fun! My 10 year old daughter absolutely LOVES this game! I actually never played Clue as a kid myself so I was surprised how quickly I figured the game out! Love all the characters and the little metal game peices seem high quality to me.
customer_reviews.author: wiretag

customer_reviews.title: Item Not As Described
customer_reviews.text: Item not as described. We ordered the 2 sided board game from 2017. The game we received is not 2 sided....it is a 2015 one-sided board. My family was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Frey

customer_reviews.title: Reg game... not a double sided board.
customer_reviews.text: The game delivered is the classic game. So overall a fun game to spend some family time. But not the advertised edition in which it does not have a boardwalk version of the game. But cannot beat the price for the original game...
customer_reviews.author: dj_jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Blah new look
customer_reviews.text: The game and rules remain the same but i am not a fan of this redesigned version. I guess that overall its nicer but its not what i expected and honestly I'm a fan of nostalgic things so this was a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Goblin

customer_reviews.title: Fun and entertaining without electronics
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids really like this version! Ask to play it a lot. Learning that winning is not the main objective: enjoying the companionship and figuring out "whodunit" is! Gets them away from electronics. Enjoy stretching their mind!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast game play, cheap box and board
customer_reviews.text: This is a faster game than the original clue due to the clue cards which contain extra opportunities to see peoples cards. The box is very, very, very cheap, more like card stock than a box. There is also nothing in the box to keep the parts separate, though due to the exceedingly cheap price, that should be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: quick fun
customer_reviews.text: Classic game doesn't last too long. It's pretty fun and easy to learn. It's great for older kids too and family-friendly. However, I feel like it would get boring after playing it once or twice.
customer_reviews.author: Xla

customer_reviews.title: Super fun for adults and children.
customer_reviews.text: Great family game. I don't know how I never played this as a kid, but I play it now! Fun for adults and my 9-year old gets the strategy. The 7-year old mostly gets it but needs just a little help picking up on the clues others give away, often unintentionally (and learning not to give clues away himself!). Nice way to spend time together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: Good old game of past
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loved it, bought for his 8th birthday. I remember this from my childrens days when we used to play. A very exciting game of old and still keeps everyone interested. Love that the cost is so affordable on Amazon. If you havent bought this for the kids, I suggest you do so and your kids will be happy playing for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Mara

customer_reviews.title: Another board game to add to the Collection
customer_reviews.text: My son loves playing Clue. No complaints on the purchase or how it was received. Gifted this item to my child on Christmas as he loves board games and it was a favorite when I was younger.
customer_reviews.author: QueenRinda

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: This is a great family game. I grew up playing it and now the younger kids in our family will also. They love it! A great interactive game. My daughter is 8 and learning to play. She is so excited when we play.
customer_reviews.author: Trishaf

customer_reviews.title: They sit on a throne of lies
customer_reviews.text: Bought the game because I was excited to try the new boardwalk board. I open the box and it’s the classic mansion. WTF you advertise that it was 2 sided with the classic and boardwalk sides but it’s not
customer_reviews.author: floridagirl

customer_reviews.title: Well spent family time!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my stepdaughter for Christmas. We had the best time playing that night, lots of laughs and good family time spent together. There is the new character, Orchid, but we just called it Mrs. White anyway because we love her from the movie. Great memories for me from my childhood, my sister and I played this game to death. Definitely recommend, so much fun solving the case!
customer_reviews.author: DarkSoulWithin

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: This game was great! I used to play this over and over when I was in grade school and in my teens. It is still so much fun and exciting to play. I like the new character and new clue cards. The Scooby Doo version of this is also very fun. I would give this a 10 on a 1-10 scale!
customer_reviews.author: mark murray

customer_reviews.title: Being a Kid Again
customer_reviews.text: This was one of my favourite games as a kid, and the film 'CLUE' with its all star cast is in my top five comedies!! Playing this game, we reenacted some of the film's scenes!!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Lamprey

customer_reviews.title: Yay! Family fun!
customer_reviews.text: Total blast from the past! Purchased this classic game for my nieces and nephews In Europe. Ages 6-17, we all had fun playing! It’s an updated board but the same ole characters I believe.
customer_reviews.author: Nai

customer_reviews.title: Kids have new interest in a classic game
customer_reviews.text: My boys had never played Clue. The both loved the concept and played it for a few hours. They enjoyed it so much they asked to have a game night we can enjoy and invite friends to play as well.
customer_reviews.author: D. Perez

customer_reviews.title: Read instructions multiple times
customer_reviews.text: It was very challenging at 1st me or my kids did not know how to play a lot of yelling going on and a little cheating until we got it lol but it is a great family game
customer_reviews.author: Toya

customer_reviews.title: Save money and get original
customer_reviews.text: It was okay but not as good as the original version. Should have saved my money for the original one since this is too cartoonish and not as much of a mysterious feel to it like the original one.
customer_reviews.author: The Clever Panda

customer_reviews.title: Just the usually clue game
customer_reviews.text: Love the game and it is a high quality board. My only complaint is that the description says it is a reversible board that includes the boardwalk and a few additional pieces that the traditional game doesn’t have. The board I received was not reversible nor did it have the extras.
customer_reviews.author: Mary montoya

customer_reviews.title: Much Needed Classic Game
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our Family Game Nights. I loved this game as a child and wanted to share it with my kids. I hadn't played the game in years, and I had to read up on the instructions which were easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Ozzy

customer_reviews.title: GREAT family game
customer_reviews.text: We gifted this to our 10 year old daughter for Christmas, and we have played it non stop since, sometimes 4 or 5 times in a day! Cards are already showing wear and tear from playing so much! Great family game!
customer_reviews.author: Sam I am

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my nephews as a Christmas present when it was on sale and they love it for family game nights. This was one of my favorite games as kid!
customer_reviews.author: LittleMissSmallWorld

customer_reviews.title: Great classic!
customer_reviews.text: Got this on Black Friday! Can’t be $5 for this classic team working game!
customer_reviews.author: H. M. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Fun Game All Around
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted to learn how to but my family wasn’t big on games. Now that I have children, I finally got to! Now, I love it so much! Makes the kids to think strategies ! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: ERN W.

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: I loved playing this when I was little so I bought it for my children. It’s just like when we were younger but “cooler” they have some new features. Great game-fun to play!!!
customer_reviews.author: melissa edri

customer_reviews.title: YES! Great game for bored adults/children!
customer_reviews.text: No power, candles only, storm, and then those days when I am uber busy working and not a technology day for grands, pull out the CLUE! Interesting interaction between grands, adults, and grands and the adults! Fun game always leads to convos on global intrigue.
customer_reviews.author: cherrib

customer_reviews.title: Still a Classic!
customer_reviews.text: This was a favorite game from my childhood, so I got it for my ten year old for Christmas. We have had fun playing it. The game has added a few new options to make it interesting when playing with a group. He's enjoyed figuring out by deducing what cads we all have. It's still a fun game all these years later.
customer_reviews.author: Mindylynne

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Clue is one of my favorite games ever! I was excited to see this and so cheap but when it got here there was no weapons included! I was very disappointed but it's a great game!
customer_reviews.author: Jayson K. Coelho

customer_reviews.title: New Rules, but Still Fun!
customer_reviews.text: So, I'm old. I remembered the rules from my old Clue game back in the 80's. The rules have changed but this one is still great fun for Family Game Night.
customer_reviews.author: Stinkerbelle

customer_reviews.title: The whole family loves it.
customer_reviews.text: We've only had this game about 2 weeks and we've played it many times already. The whole family has fun with it, including my 8 year old grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Beth F

customer_reviews.title: Fun without attacking
customer_reviews.text: Awesome fun game that doesn't require you attack other players. Monopoly you have to bankrupt people risk you have to kill people... this is a mental memory game.
customer_reviews.author: Cary

customer_reviews.title: It's clue
customer_reviews.text: if you know clue then you know this game.. it just has updated visuals on the board and cards but game is the same. Very easy to learn for the younger ones as well
customer_reviews.author: Justin K.

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful classic
customer_reviews.text: This game is a classic and a staple in our game closet. The board is beautiful and the game pieces are nice. Good game!
customer_reviews.author: KJulia

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It had missing pieces...no tokens or dice. Window has closed on returned s and in order to get missing pieces Hasboro wants personal information!!! Why do you need my birthdate to give me pieces missing from a game I bought?
customer_reviews.author: Cobalt blue

customer_reviews.title: Amazing family game.
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my kids for Christmas and it was a huge hit. This was my favorite game as a kid, so it’s nice being able to play it with my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Laura McGinnis

customer_reviews.title: Younger kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my kids but was worried they were still too young, they are 7 & 5, but they picked up on it it and love it! We have played this nonstop since opening it.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Witt

customer_reviews.title: Not like the old one
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorites as a kid. My 9 year old thought it was okay but he likes my original game better and I do also. Characters look so different along with some rule changes
customer_reviews.author: corinne d

customer_reviews.title: Multi-purpose game, vgood
customer_reviews.text: Terrible terrible game. I NEVER win, nor come close. Everyone else seemed to enjoy it. Ten year old love it...wins for her, she very competitive. Good for using thinking skills
customer_reviews.author: nick consolo

customer_reviews.title: a big hit!
customer_reviews.text: we bought this game just a few months ago, one of the cardboard pieces is slightly ripped but i dont blame that on the quality of the game. it is super easy to learn and doesnt take a super long time, which i appreciate. the only thing that i dont really like about it is that it replaced a couple of the original clue characters like professor plum. other than that it was a good product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this game, she is 8. I like that it makes kids think! Great price too! There are some small changes to this newer version, one new character and some new cards added to the game play, but I believe you can choose not to use them and it will be more like the old school Clue.
customer_reviews.author: TLang

customer_reviews.title: Description lies about what is included
customer_reviews.text: The description is wrong it says that there is a mansion and a boardwalk version.. via a double sided board.. however there is only the mansion version with an additional character...
customer_reviews.author: Adam jay sortor

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Family Game
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful games for 9 year olds to adults to play. This game has been around for years! It was a Christmas gift for a needy child. I hope they enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: Molly's  mom

customer_reviews.title: Very Fun Game Still, even 40 years later.....
customer_reviews.text: As a child many years ago, my brother and I played Clue. I loved the game at that time and I purchased it now for my Grandchildren and I still love playing this Game. A great Gift for your kids, Grandkids, and us..... Grandma and Grandpa..
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable
customer_reviews.text: This was one of my sons gifts and he enjoys it. It’s a little hard to understand what to do so we just made up our own way of playing. I get how to set everything up but after that I have no clue. I do feel the game board is well made. Wish they had characters instead of colored pawns though.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Clue still holds up. Great Games always do
customer_reviews.text: Clue has always been a fun game. With this updated set the play and fun are here as they always were. My wife and I played it last week with our grandchildren. Game moves along well, And holds their 9 and 11 year old attention. My 11 year old won. It was a fun and family friendly evening that the kids asked for .
customer_reviews.author: Poppi

customer_reviews.title: Updated version is just as fun!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE board games and this one is among the faves! As a Mom, I love playing games with my kids that I used to love, and even better -- no electronics!
customer_reviews.author: Deana E.

customer_reviews.title: AFFORDABLE FAMILY FUN FOR AT LEAST 2 PLAYERS OR MORE!!
customer_reviews.text: Great game!!!!! Giving this a 5 because it's family friendly fun for such an affordable price. I paid under $ 10 for it and it will last a very long time!! I like the addition of ORCHID and how they updated the characters. Small compacted box, easily fits in most drawers. Thanks again Amazon, yet again, another wonderful buy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: REPO

customer_reviews.title: Fun family game!
customer_reviews.text: Fun family game, just as I remember playing as a child with a fun new play option to shake it up a bit. You can still play the old way if you prefer. Awesome game!
customer_reviews.author: Brian L. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Great game for Teens!
customer_reviews.text: Great game for teens! My kids always play it when friends come over. Not too many pieces. Pretty straight forward to learn. It’s a murder mystery game so I would not recommend it for young children.
customer_reviews.author: MARY DESILVA

customer_reviews.title: Same Game, Still Fun
customer_reviews.text: Same fun as always. Not much different, just more multicultural. There are extra clue cards, but we don’t use them, makes the game end too quickly. If you have the original, keep it. Not different enough to warrant a “ new” game.
customer_reviews.author: Meme

customer_reviews.title: I wish I would have gotten the original
customer_reviews.text: I would have rather “real people” than pawns as it gets confusing who is who by color when playing and the box came crushed on one side
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Great fun game for adults
customer_reviews.text: Best game ever! We play this all the time during game night! A big hit with adults, not so much with younger kids
customer_reviews.author: Shine

customer_reviews.title: Great Game
customer_reviews.text: Love buying games online as they are usually much cheaper than buying in stores. Arrived quickly and as advertised. Perfect game for the family!
customer_reviews.author: OkieGal

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the family
customer_reviews.text: My family has always loved clue my some who is 10 had a little trouble learning it but he also didnt really want to play it either. But good product fun to plau
customer_reviews.author: Josh Greene

customer_reviews.title: Good game to play
customer_reviews.text: the rules are simple. The game pieces are cute. one character replaced was Mrs. White, which wasn't my favorite one anyway so the change was good. Fun game. worth buying. Delivered as said. Was in good condition in box.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for a student or young adult. Bought these to give to a former foreign exchange student, and it fits in medium flat rate postal box. Saves money on international shipping! Arrived quickly and well packaged. Recommend both the product and the seller! Clue is a great game.
customer_reviews.author: Patsy A Moore

customer_reviews.title: Same old fun as always! Great for gameschooling!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my homeschool class. I provide classes for homeschool children. I mostly got it for my Social Studies class 4-8 graders. If your Social Studies curriculum involves Sociology this is a great game for students to use social cues to solve the game. It also is great for Math, as there is quite a bit of logic involved, a great tool for Algebraic thinking. It makes a great addiction to a classroom or home. Fun for adults too!
customer_reviews.author: Aliya

customer_reviews.title: Updated from the original- fun once we got the hang of it
customer_reviews.text: The directions aren’t the world’s clearest but between our recollection of the classic game played in childhood combined with a restart, We got the hang of the minor updates to the original from the 1980’s and had fun with our preteen kids.
customer_reviews.author: KateM

product_meta.title: Clue Game
product_meta.description: Style:Classic ClueOne murder… 6 suspects. In this suspenseful Clue game, players have to find out who's responsible for murdering Mr. Boddy of Tudor Mansion in his own home. Get the scoop on the mansion's rooms, weapons and guests and start detecting! Was it Plum with the wrench in the library? Or Green with the candlestick in the study? Eliminate information throughout the game in this classic whodunit. The player who correctly accuses Who, What, and Where wins! Hasbro Gaming and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: Who committed the murder in the mansion?
Eliminate the suspects and discover whodunit, with what and where
Correctly guess the murderer to win
Introducing a new character , Dr. Orchid as one of the suspects

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
